faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to your most common questions.

shipping.question: What are the shipping options?
shipping.answer: We offer free standard shipping (3-5 business days) on all orders. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for an additional fee.

returns.question: How can I return an item?
returns.answer: You can return any item free of charge within 30 days of receipt. Please visit our returns portal to start the process.

sizing.question: How do I find my right size?
sizing.answer: Each product page includes a detailed size guide with specific measurements. If you are unsure, do not hesitate to contact our customer service for a personal consultation.

care.question: How do I care for my items?
care.answer: Care instructions are available on the label of each item and in the 'Details & Care' section on the product page. For delicate materials like cashmere or silk, we recommend professional dry cleaning.

contact.question: How can I contact you?
contact.answer: Our customer service team is available by email at service@ezentials.com or through our contact form. We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.
